alert.note: Alert for Iberia; St. Mary; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, northwestern St. Mary and east central Vermilion Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Henry, or 7 miles southwest of Avery Island, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Jeanerette, Avery Island, Delcambre, Lydia, Acadiana Regional Airport, Henry and Weeks Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
